name: dropdown-multiselect
title: Dropdown Multiselect
description: Dropdown Multi Select allows to select one or more items from the list.

options.name: model
options.description: A result of the selection. Can return objects in the array (see return-object attribute).

options.name: position
options.description: Vertical position of the dropdown list against the dropdown button. It becomes handy when dropdown floats to the right.

options.name: default-text
options.description: Default text shown before selection is made.

options.name: default-text-multiple
options.description: Default text shown after selection is made.

options.name: max-count
options.description: Force default-text-multiple to be shown when more than max-count items selected.

options.name: return-object
options.description: If set to true, a full object will be returned in the model array. By default only values are returned.

options.name: disabled
options.description: Make button look inactive by adding the disabled boolean attribute.
